name: Takeoff from London Heathrow (British Airways Airbus A319 'Olympic Dove')
description:
Taxi, takeoff and climbout from London Heathrow Airport runway 09R for flight BA1402 to Manchester, onboard British Airways 'Olympic Dove' Airbus A319 G-EUPH, seat 8A.

The video begins as we taxi out from Pier A, Terminal 5, and includes the taxi to runway 09R and departure into a beautiful sunny evening above the clouds.

For video of the full flight, click here:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P5MOBS8LNWs

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
